entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
